00034 #ifndef __CCONF_H
00035 #define __CCONF_H
00036 
00037 #include <string>
00038 #include <stdexcept>
00039 #include <map>
00040 #include <inttypes.h>
00041 
00045 class cconf {
00046         protected:
00047 
00048                 std::string fn; 
00049                 bool read; 
00050 
00052                 cconf(const std::string &fn) : fn(fn), read(false) {}
00053         public:
00065                 class err : public std::exception {
00066                         protected:
00067                                 std::string w; 
00068                         public:
00070                                 err(const cconf *cc, const std::string &s)
00071                                         : w(cc->fn) {
00072                                     w+=": ";
00073                                     w+=s;
00074                                 }
00076                                 err(const cconf *cc, const std::string &s, 
00077                                         const std::string &s1)
00078                                         : w(cc->fn) {
00079                                     w+=": ";
00080                                     w+=s;
00081                                     w+=s1;
00082                                 }
00083 
00085                                 virtual ~err() throw () {}
00086                                 
00088                                 const char *what() const throw() {
00089                                     return w.c_str();
00090                                 }
00091                 };
00092         
00096                 class read_error : public err {
00097                         public:
00099                                 read_error(const cconf * cc,
00100                                         const std::string &w)
00101                                         : err(cc, "can't read: ", w) {}
00103                                 virtual ~read_error() throw() {}
00104                 };
00105 
00109                 class empty_error : public err {
00110                         public:
00112                                 empty_error(const cconf * cc)
00113                                         : err(cc, "value can't be empty") {}
00115                                 virtual ~empty_error() throw() {}
00116                 };
00117             
00121                 class range_error : public err {
00122                         public:
00124                                 range_error(const cconf *cc,
00125                                         const std::string &v,
00126                                         const std::string &min,
00127                                         const std::string &max)
00128                                         : err(cc, "value not in range: ") {
00129                                     w+=v;
00130                                     w+="; minimum is: ";
00131                                     w+=min;
00132                                     w+="; maximum is: ";
00133                                     w+=max;
00134                                 }
00136                                 virtual ~range_error() throw() {}
00137                 };
00139         
00144                 friend class err; 
00145 
00146 };
00147 
00151 class clnconf : public cconf {
00152         protected:
00153                 std::string val; 
00154                 std::string ln_read(); 
00155         public:
00156                 clnconf(const std::string &fn, const std::string & def);
00157                 virtual std::string val_str(); 
00158                 virtual ~clnconf() {}
00159 };
00160 
00164 class cintconf : public clnconf {
00165         protected:
00166                 int32_t ival; 
00167                 int32_t min; 
00168                 int32_t max; 
00169                 int32_t mult; 
00170 
00171                 int32_t str2val( const std::string & ); 
00172         public:
00173                 cintconf(const std::string &fn, const std::string &def,
00174                         int32_t = 1 );
00175                 cintconf(const std::string &fn, const std::string &def,
00176                         int32_t, int32_t, int32_t = 1 );
00177 
00178                 virtual int32_t val_int(); 
00179                 std::string val_str(); 
00180                 virtual ~cintconf() {}
00181 };
00182 
00186 class cuidconf : public cintconf {
00187         public:
00188                 cuidconf(const std::string &fn, const std::string &def);
00189                 int32_t val_int();
00190 };
00191 
00195 class cgidconf : public cintconf {
00196         public:
00197                 cgidconf(const std::string &fn, const std::string &def);
00198                 int32_t val_int();
00199 };
00200 
00205 class cmapconf : public cconf {
00206         public:
00208                 typedef std::map<std::string, std::string> map_type;
00209 
00210         protected:
00211                 map_type map; 
00212 
00213         public:
00214                 cmapconf(const std::string &fn);
00215                 const map_type & val_map(); 
00216 };
